title: Creating a Common Denominator
text: We must find the LCD in order to be able to add the fractions. The LCM of $$m^2-m-2$$ and $$m^2+3m+2$$ is $$\left(m+1\right) \left(m-2\right) \left(m+2\right)$$
speech: We must find the LCD in order to be able to add the fractions. The LCM of  m squared minus m minus 2  and  m squared, plus 3 m plus 2  is  parentheses m plus 1,  times, parentheses m minus 2,  times, parentheses m plus 2,
pacedSpeech: We must find the LCD in order to be able to add the fractions. The LCM of   m squared minus m minus 2
and   m squared, plus 3 m plus 2
is    m plus 1,  times,  m minus 2,  times,  m plus 2,

title: Rewriting Each Fraction
text: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get $$\frac{m+2}{\left(m+1\right) \left(m-2\right) \left(m+1\right)}$$ + $$\frac{5m\left(m-2\right)}{\left(m+1\right) \left(m-2\right) \left(m+1\right)}$$
speech: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get  fraction, m plus 2, over, parentheses m plus 1,  times, parentheses m minus 2,  times, parentheses m plus 1, ,   +  fraction, 5 m, parentheses m minus 2, , over, parentheses m plus 1,  times, parentheses m minus 2,  times, parentheses m plus 1, ,
pacedSpeech: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get   fraction, m plus 2, over,  m plus 1,  times,  m minus 2,  times,  m plus 1, ,
+   fraction, 5 m,  m minus 2, , over,  m plus 1,  times,  m minus 2,  times,  m plus 1, ,

title: Adding the Fractions
speech: Adding the fractions, we get  fraction, m plus 2 plus 5 m, parentheses m minus 2, , over, parentheses m plus 1,  times, parentheses m minus 2,  times, parentheses m plus 2, ,
pacedSpeech: Adding the fractions, we get   fraction, m plus 2 plus 5 m,  m minus 2, , over,  m plus 1,  times,  m minus 2,  times,  m plus 2, ,
